title: nautilus skin ideas
body: Nautilus needs a new skin. And I got a good idea or two. Found from internet but I vote they look amazing. If anyone else has good ideas plz put up. Nautilus is one of my most fav champs and I don't care much for his current skins.  So pleas  make more riot. Pleeeease lol

replies.body: Oh my god Artic Ops Nautilus, I mean woooow! Absolutely mind blowing!
I vote for anchorman Nautilus. The true news reporter

> [{quoted}](name=The Red Warden,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=Xl3I1bdi,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2014-09-02T19:42:19.457+0000)
>
> I vote for anchorman Nautilus. The true news reporter

Anchorman Nautilus... I would want this.  I can see it becoming a legendary skin as well.
"Sometimes I feel like this job just weighs me down. (*dum-de bum bum through the air*)"
That necro, these boards don't allow necro bumps to have impact though
BUMP
A good idea doesn't stop being one just because time has passed. The same is true for bad off topic replies.
I want both ! Why not !
THANK YOU

ARCTIC OPS NAUTILUS!!! C'mon community! We got AstroNautilus didn't we?! This one isn't any different!!

Can you imagine icicles on his ult?! :O
100% agree
Arctic Ops Nautilus doesn't make too much sense... you know.. cause he's GIGANTIC. Not exactly "Ops" material. However, Deep Snow is adorable and awesome too!

Just because that he is GIGANTIC doesn't mean that he cannot be a part of Arctic Ops Crew. By the way, that is not a good reason to not add him to the crew. That is like saying that Juggernaut from X-men doesn't belong in X-men because he is GIGANTIC. {{champion:111}}

Arctic Ops skins have been portrayed as stealth outfits. Kennen = Ninja. Varus = Bow Wielder (no sound projectiles) Nautilus would be heard a mile away just walking. So in that case, it doesn't make much sense. The idea is still cool, I just wouldn't call it Arctic Ops and confuse the theme.
U would still need a heavy duty guy. And arctic ops may not be just stealth. Naut is the distraction. Lol
Haha. I do like the idea of the heavy support. I just don't think he make much sense on the team right now. (Two stealth buddies and a GIANT?!) Distraction would be funny though.
Also. Military does have juggernaut suits so he could still count

**Big Daddy Nautilus**
A rip from a game called Bioshock
Also has an animation with {{champion:1}} and she could have a **Little Sister Annie** skin
also from Bioshock.
[The Big Daddy{{champion:111}} skin](http://www.rarewallpapers.com/games/big-daddy-bioshock-2607/)
[Alternate Big Daddy {{champion:111}} skin](http://www.slashgamer.com/wp-content/uploads/2009/08/bigdaddy2.jpg)
[The {{champion:1}} skin](http://images.wikia.com/bioshock/images/archive/1/1f/20100215233205!Little_Sister.png)
More about the game [Bioshock](http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/BioShock)
only thing would be if they made him big daddy and did {{champion:1}} as a little sister they either have to make bitter like a big sister or one of the other big daddy's but i do love the idea
but they could get sued
yeah but could also always ask first same thing im sure it could of happened with the red riding hood skins and the Alice in wonder land skins to it never hurts to try tho does it?

Nautilus has been raiding Draft for a while recently. I really do hope Riot will make a new skin cause the Worldbreaker doesn't really match his style. Maybe even doing something like how they made Arcade Hecarim but for Naut? I dunno. Imagining this bug guy in a tutu (More or less that concept) seems hilarious. At least give a skin that changes up his dialogue.
I vote for battle case or mecca naut{{champion:111}}
I love {{champion:111}}  he was my main for awhile he deff needs more love. the ops and news idea are amazing and I would buy them both in a {{summoner:4}}
Still waiting for a Jaeger Nautilus. >_>
Got my vote for arctic ops Nautilus!{{champion:111}}

Absolutely awesome skin ideas, but do they come with his rework?

Mike
Mike@ProGamerHub.com
ProGamerHub.om
There is a pretty cheating thing with arctic naut. The laser could be caitlyn lol. It's like it was meant to be
Rito please <3 I don't even play Nautilus anymore but that Arctic ops skin would make me want to try him again.

I've had this idea for a while now.   Pity my lack of art skills make any way to visualize it myself naught. 


Justicar Nautilus. 


Think about it.  He's a Holy Diver.  And he would look really cool in justicar threads. That anchor would be sick.
Lol. How do we get riot to see this? Lol
The deep snow naut makes me think of {{champion:33}}

Arctic Ops Nautilus.

Rito pls.
I APPROVE

So far I hav  had 2 skin ideas that riot likes or should like. Theses are 1. The other  is Jurassic kha'zix. The told me they will try to do it cuz the void kids deserve a full set. Along with a sister lol. But I hope riot makes them. Cuz you have to remember. As {{champion:121}} said. Change is good.
How about Definitely not nautilous skin.. He's disguised as blitzcrank.
Artic Ops Naut looks like, might be better to have a visor that slides up and down like Astronautilus, when he pops Titan's Wrath.
Lol I guys naut is more popular then I thought lol
Much like Rammus, its hard not to love Naut!
So true. Naut needs more login. So more skins lol
Hire this man
